document_data.mainbody:
Terse Torvalt was a member of the Guild from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Terse was a halfling man with dark brown skin, green eyes, and curly brown hair. He wore an archers leathers dyed in the Guilds green colors, hid his face behind a Guild-green bandana, and carried a bow.
In the , Terse Torvalt was tasked with standing guard at the secret entrance into Baldurs Gates Undercellar, where the Guilds Guildhall was hidden. Whilst a half-orcish enforcer Tusgront manned the main entrance, Terse was ready to dispatch any unwanted guest from a nearby rooftop.
